duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and manage sales operations to support the President and VP's, including sales event coordination and sales meeting planning.
Analyze and report on sales performance, pricing strategy, and competitive positioning.
Act as the go-to person for customer communications related to sales operations and support the sales and marketing teams.
Assist in launching new business lines and manage individual account forecasts.
Review customer agreements and facilitate the on-boarding of new accounts and distributors.
Review and manage product introduction, project planning, and NPI document action items to ensure on-time product launch.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in related field with 5 years proven experience (Master's preferred)
